author: cbs8
title: Punta Cana Lifestyles Magazine Summer Issue Offering the Best of Punta Cana
text:
ISLAND INSIDER
PUNTA CANA, Dominican Republic , Aug. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Punta Cana Lifestyles Magazine brings you a slice of the best that Punta Cana has to offer: the latest home decor trends, lifestyle options, hot spots, hidden gems, tourist hideaways, nightlife, unique island recipes, and of course the newest and most in-demand real estate on the market.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150818/259290
This Summer 2015 issue features former Miss Aruba and long-time Punta Cana resident Karen-Ann St. Clair , as she launches With Love from Punta Cana , her debut line of vintage handbags, accessories and home decor. Karen offers a tropical, eye-catching twist that captures the essence of island living, and everything is made right here in the Dominican Republic .
Check out Punta Cana's latest and most exciting real estate offering, Caribbean Lake Apartments at the Cocotal Golf & Country Club, a state-of-the-art development nestled in an 18-hole course designed by legendary Spanish champion Jose 'Pepe' Gancedo. Caribbean Lake boasts the best in interior design, convenience and comfort, with spectacular views, on-site golf and access to the beach via a beautiful beach club.
The magazine also announced their new video channel on YouTube, collaborating with local artists on programming and content designed to encourage residents and visitors to get to know and support local businesses. The professional video was made by Margarita Vasyukova from SOUL X-RAY and music provided by Luk Follin - both Punta Cana residents and artists. The intro video provides a three-minute glimpse of life in Punta Cana , and future videos will feature residents, artists and business owners talking about life in the Island.
ABOUT PUNTA CANA LIFESTYLES MAGAZINE
Punta Cana Lifestyles Magazine is an ISLAND INSIDER publication highlighting local businesses and supporting community events, showcasing the best that this famous destination has to offer residents and visitors alike. Each issue features an extensive business directory, as well as maps, guides and insider knowledge from local experts on all aspects of Punta Cana's unique lifestyle.To download a copy of the magazine or view the video , visit www.puntacanalifestyles.com .
Contact:
Jocelyn Hernandez Irizarry
809-552-0421
